Posts.Content: I'm 41.  I've had 3 mammos in the past couple years and each time it shows cysts.  Today I went for my yearly mammo and they found that the cyst had grown, so they want to have it aspirated.  The tech said not to worry and that on a scale of 1 to 10 I should worry "maybe a 2."
Posts.Title: Draining (aspirating) a breast cyst....

Posts.Content: I don't have anything to add to what Merrida wrote, but I just wanted to give you a cyber hug. I know how scary the waiting and not-knowing can be. (((Hugs)))
Posts.Title: Overian Cancer scare or is it IBS im so lost !!! please help

Posts.Content: I've been making smoothies with my Nutribullet and make sure to use kale or spinach. Dark, leafy veggies are great for you. I add strawberries, pineapple or any other fresh juice to make it taste good!
Posts.Title: "Healthy Diet" for breast cancer?
